description_expanded: WoodWick Ellipse Amethyst Sky Trilogy Scented Candle (16oz) is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for home fragrance. A large 3-wick candle with a signature wood wick that crackles like a fireplace. The Amethyst Sky scent combines notes of violet, sandalwood, and musk. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
